content: a quick knit for small decorative pumpkins for your home a beginner friendly knit - techniques needed are knit purl cast on and cast off free pattern with full instructions and images on how to sew your pumpkin together these are a small quick knit which look nice in a group knitted using a thicker yarn for speed ease and texture finished item is approx 7cm wide x 5 5cm high 7cm including stalk 2 5 inches wide x 2 inches high 2 75 inches including stalk made using red heart super saver yarn which is aran weight worsted weight medium and 4 5mm needles yellow pumpkin completed using chunky yarn on 5mm needles uses a small amount of stash yarn a fun quick knit for a small display for the autumn/fall/halloween season
